pkgmetadata.longdescription: Poloka (formerly TOADS) is a library to analyze FITS images. It is written mostly in C++. Features include: * image cataloguing (through SExtractor and its own tools) * image registration and resampling * image stacking * image subtraction * PSF and aperture photometry * transient objects light curve reconstruction with complex background
